entry.title: About Me - M Ridho Swasta
entry.summary: Hello, welcome to my portfolio site. Nice to see you here. I am…
entry.content:
Hello, welcome to my portfolio site. Nice to see you here.

I am very happy because you are visiting my portfolio website right now.  Let me introduce my self, My name is M Ridho Swasta. I am a technology maniac, yeah it can be said like that. Why do I call myself using that word? Because I love to learn about technologies, especially in cloud , linux and data engineering. I learn about technology since I was in my junior high school. My first love in technology was Ubuntu Linux. Yes! That's right, I love it because I was thinking that linux is the OS for hacker :P LOL! 

After that moment, I became more enthusiast about technology , I ever made a game server for GTA San Andreas and Perfect World. I also made a dozens of Website from forums until blog lol. So I try to summarize all of my projects in this site. Hope you enjoy visiting my website. 

Best Regards, 

M Ridho Swasta

And the servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk upon the earth easily, and when the ignorant address them [harshly], they say [words of] peace  ( QS : Al - Furqan : 63 )

entry.title: Kreditku - Marketplace Peminjaman Online
entry.summary: Kreditku is a marketplace for loan. It is built for final…
entry.content:
Kreditku is a marketplace for loan. It is built for final project at Digital Talent Scholarship 2019 conducted by Kominfo. 

Backend programming language : 
Flask Framework ( Python Based )

Frontend recipee :
html + Bootstrap 4

Database : 
Mysql
